examples.example: 每天下班我都会笑着和同事们说下午好。

translate.english: Every day after work I will smile and say good afternoon to my colleagues.

examples.example: 当下午的阳光洒满窗前，我微笑着对朋友说下午好。

translate.english: When the afternoon sunshine spills over the window, I smile and say good afternoon to my friend.

examples.example: 今天下午好开心，和朋友们一起度过了美好的时光。

translate.english: This afternoon is so happy, and spent a wonderful time with friends.
